description: Design and development of DevEx agents using Azure AI Foundry

The agents are specialized in summarizing the project changes specific to developer, suggesting tasks based on changes, drafting sw requirements, sw documentation, test cases, test code, test runs and adapting the documentations to latest changes in the software
The agents are integrated into CI/CD pipelines and are accessible through vs code extensions
These agents are targeted to improve the overall developer experience and increase the focus of developers

Protocol simulators are used at design and verification of production software
